sections.text:
79-3805.Athletic team or sport for female students; acts prohibited.

A government entity, licensing or accrediting organization, or athletic association shall not entertain a complaint, open an investigation, or take any other adverse action against a public or private school or a public or private postsecondary educational institution for maintaining any separate interscholastic athletic team or sport for female students.

SourceLaws 2025, LB89, ยง 5.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
